verses.verse: Now <WG1161> the Spirit <WG4151> speaks <WG3004> expressly <WG4490>, that <WG3754> in <WG1722> the latter <WG5306> times <WG2540> some <WG5100> shall depart from <WG868> the faith <WG4102>, giving care to <WG4337> seducing <WG4108> spirits <WG4151>, and <WG2532> doctrines <WG1319> of demons <WG1140>;
Speaking lies <WG5573> in <WG1722> hypocrisy <WG5272>; having <WG2743> their <WG2398> conscience <WG4893> seared with a hot iron <WG2743>;

Forbidding <WG2967> to marry <WG1060>, and commanding to abstain from <WG567> meats <WG1033>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> has created <WG2936> to <WG1519> be received <WG3336> with <WG3326> thanksgiving <WG2169> of them which believe <WG4103> and <WG2532> know <WG1921> the truth <WG225>.
For <WG3754> every <WG3956> creature <WG2938> of God <WG2316> is good <WG2570>, and <WG2532> nothing <WG3762> to be refused <WG579>, if it be received <WG2983> with <WG3326> thanksgiving <WG2169>:
For <WG1063> it is sanctified <WG37> by <WG1223> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> and <WG2532> prayer <WG1783>.

If you put <WG5294> the brothers <WG80> in memory of <WG5294> these things <WG5023>, you shall be <WG2071> a good <WG2570> minister <WG1249> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, nourished up in <WG1789> the words <WG3056> of faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> of good <WG2570> teaching <WG1319>, unto what <WG3739> you have attained <WG3877>.
But <WG1161> refuse <WG3868> profane <WG952> and <WG2532> old wives <WG1126>' fables <WG3454>, and <WG1161> exercise <WG1128> yourself <WG4572> rather unto <WG4314> godliness <WG2150>.

For <WG1063> bodily <WG4984> exercise <WG1129> profits <WG5624> little <WG3641>: but <WG1161> godliness <WG2150> is <WG2076> profitable <WG5624> unto <WG4314> all things <WG3956>, having <WG2192> promise <WG1860> of the life <WG2222> that now is <WG3568>, and <WG2532> of that which is to come <WG3195>.
This <WG3588> is a faithful <WG4103> saying <WG3056> and <WG2532> worthy <WG514> of all <WG3956> acceptance <WG594>.

So <WG1063> therefore <WG5124> we <WG2872> both <WG2532> labor <WG2872> and <WG2532> suffer reproach <WG3679>, because <WG3754> we trust <WG1679> in <WG1909> the living <WG2198> God <WG2316>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the Savior <WG4990> of all <WG3956> men <WG444>, specially <WG3122> of those that believe <WG4103>.

Let <WG2706> no man <WG3367> despise <WG2706> your <WG4675> youth <WG3503>; but <WG235> be <WG1096> an example <WG5179> to the believers <WG4103>, in <WG1722> word <WG3056>, in <WG1722> living <WG391>, in <WG1722> love <WG26>, in <WG1722> spirit <WG4151>, in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>, in <WG1722> purity <WG47>.
Until <WG2193> I come <WG2064>, give attendance <WG4337> to reading <WG320>, to exhortation <WG3874>, to teaching <WG1319>.

Neglect <WG272> not <WG3361> the gift <WG5486> that is in <WG1722> you <WG4671>, which <WG3739> was given <WG1325> you <WG4671> by <WG1223> prophecy <WG4394>, with <WG3326> the laying on <WG1936> of the hands <WG5495> of the elders <WG4244>.

Meditate upon <WG3191> these things <WG5023>; give yourself wholly <WG2468> to <WG1722> them <WG5125>; that <WG2443> your <WG4675> profiting <WG4297> may <WG5600> appear <WG5318> to <WG1722> all <WG3956>.

Take care of <WG1907> yourself <WG4572>, and <WG2532> to the teaching <WG1319>; continue in <WG1961> them <WG846>: for <WG1063> in doing <WG4160> this <WG5124> you shall <WG4982> both <WG2532> save <WG4982> yourself <WG4572>, and <WG2532> them that hear <WG191> you <WG4675>.
